name: fat

fat adjective
(BIG)
Add to word list

A1 having a lot of flesh on the body: get fat He eats all the time but he never gets fat. Feeding grain to cattle makes them grow fatter quickly. Children who were teased about being fat had lower self-esteem than their classmates.
